headline: Billionaire Bill Ackman Is Betting Big on Nike. Down 57%, Is the Sportswear Stock Ready for a Comeback?
summary: Nike (NYSE: NKE) has been through the wringer lately.  The world's largest sportswear brand is suffering through one of the most challenging periods in its history.  Along the way, Nike stock is down 57% from its peak in 2021, and it's ceded significant market share and mindshare to upstart rivals like On Holding and Deckers' Hoka brand.

headline: As Tariffs Loom, How One Retailer Aims to Keep Prices Low on Nikes and Asics
summary: Academy Sports & Outdoors expects to pass on any tariff costs to customers, but it still thinks it can beat competitors on pricing.
